scenario.name: SIP_MESSAGE_FROM_OSP_INCORRECT_2
scenario.send:
MESSAGE urn:service:sos SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 69 From: SENDER <sip:SENDER@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: 911 Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 MESSAGE Content-Type: text/plain Content-Length: [len]
SIP MESSAGE from Test System
